loadCustomizedDefinition

public void loadCustomizedDefinition(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                     java.lang.annotation.Annotation annotation)
Description copied from interface: DefinitionManager
Creates a customzied object class Definition

This performance of method is the same as DefinitionManager.loadCustomizedDefinition(Class, Annotation, String) according to argument IDis null.

Specified by:
loadCustomizedDefinition in interface DefinitionManager
Parameters:
clazz - the original object class corresponding to Definition.
annotation - the specified annotation need to be interpreted of given Class.

loadCustomizedDefinition

public void loadCustomizedDefinition(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                     java.lang.annotation.Annotation annotation,
                                     java.lang.String ID)
Description copied from interface: DefinitionManager
Creates a customzied object class Definition

Note:

- In case the given annotation is null and given ID is not existed, this method will automatically create Definition corresponding to given ID.

- In case given ID is null, given annotation is not null, this method will automatically creates Definition corresponding to object class (given Class) and given annotation.

Specified by:
loadCustomizedDefinition in interface DefinitionManager
Parameters:
clazz - the original object class corresponding to Definition.
annotation - the specified annotation need to be interpreted of given Class.
ID - the ID of Definition

loadCustomizedDefinition

public Definition loadCustomizedDefinition(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                                           java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                           java.lang.annotation.Annotation annotation)
Description copied from interface: DefinitionManager
Creates a customzied object class Definition

Specified by:
loadCustomizedDefinition in interface DefinitionManager
Parameters:
field - the given Field
clazz - the original object class corresponding to Definition. In case the Definition according to this object class is not existed, DefinitionManager will automatically create corresponding Definition.
annotation - the specified annotation need to be interpreted of given Field.
Returns:
Returns previous Definition according to given Field if it exists, if not, returns null.
